Title: Directs the department of health to conduct a statewide study on the support and administration needs of the consumer-directed personal care program
Summary: Directs the department of health to conduct a statewide study on the support and administration needs of the consumer-directed personal care program; requires the results of such study be provided by December 31, 2024.
ActClause: AN ACT to direct the department of health to conduct a statewide study on the support and administration needs of the consumer-directed personal care program
